title: Tibits
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering
description: Connected with Hiltl restaurant in Zurich, Europe's oldest vegetarian restaurant, Tibits is a short stroll from famous Piccadilly Circus. Features a food boat of savory entrees as well fresh salads--help yourself to what you'd like, and a staff will weigh your plate. Food is served until 30 minutes before closing. Has fresh juices and takeaway containers available. Reservations taken for group of 8 or more.
